column1: CMOR Table OImon: Monthly Mean Ocean Cryosphere Fields
(All saved on the ocean grid; unless otherwise indicated, values are averaged over only the ocean portion of each grid cell and report 0.0 where ocean fraction is 0.)

column2: long name
column4: comment
column10: cell_methods

column2: Sea Ice Area Fraction
column4: fraction of grid cell covered by sea ice.
column10: time: mean

column2: Sea Ice Thickness
column4: the mean thickness of sea ice in the ocean portion of the grid cell (averaging over the entire ocean portion, including the ice-free fraction).  Reported as 0.0 in regions free of sea ice.
column10: time: mean area: mean where sea

column2: Sea Ice Plus Surface Snow Amount
column4: the  mass per unit area of sea ice plus snow in the ocean portion of the grid cell (averaging over the entire ocean portion, including the ice-free fraction).  Reported as 0.0 in regions free of sea ice.
column10: time: mean area: mean where sea

column2: Water Evaporation Flux from Sea Ice
column4: the average rate that water mass evaporates (or sublimates) from the sea ice surface (i.e., kg/s) divided by the area of the ocean (i.e., open ocean + sea ice) portion of the grid cell. This quantity, multiplied both by the oean area of the grid cell and by the length of the month, should yield the total mass of water evaporated (or sublimated) from the sea ice.  Reported as 0.0 in regions free of sea ice.  [This was computed differently in CMIP3.]
column10: time: mean area: mean where sea_ice over sea

column2: Snow Depth
column4: the mean thickness of snow in the ocean portion of the grid cell (averaging over the entire ocean portion, including the snow-free ocean fraction).  Reported as 0.0 in regions free of snow-covered sea ice.
column10: time: mean area: mean where sea

column2: Surface Snow Area Fraction
column4: Fraction of entire grid cell covered by snow that lies on sea ice; exclude snow that lies on land or land ice.
column10: time: mean

column2: Sea Ice Albedo
column4: Reported as "missing" if there is no sunlight or if a region is free of sea ice.
column5: This variable may be omitted unless the answers to the following questions are obvious:  Will this vary from year to year or is it a property of "bare sea ice" and sun angle? How is the time-mean calculated?
column10: time: mean area: mean where sea_ice

column2: Sea Ice Salinity
column4: When computing the time-mean here, the time-samples, weighted by the mass of sea ice in the grid cell, are accumulated and then divided by the sum of the weights.  Reported as "missing" in regions free of sea ice.
column10: time: mean (weighted by mass of sea ice)

column2: Surface Temperature of Sea Ice
column4: When computing the time-mean here, the time-samples, weighted by the area of sea ice in the grid cell, are accumulated and then divided by the sum of the weights.  Reported as "missing" in regions free of sea ice.  Note this will be the surface snow temperature in regions where snow covers the sea ice.
column10: time: mean (weighted by area of sea ice)

column2: Temperature at Interface Between Sea Ice and Snow
column4: When computing the time-mean here, the time-samples, weighted by the area of snow-covered sea ice in the grid cell, are accumulated and then divided by the sum of the weights.  Reported as "missing" in regions free of snow-covered sea ice.
column10: time: mean (weighted by area of snow-covered sea ice)

column2: Surface Rainfall Rate into the Sea Ice Portion of the Grid Cell
column4: where sea ice over sea: this is the the water mass per unit time falling as rain onto the sea ice portion of a grid cell divided by the area of the ocean portion of the grid cell (including both ice-free and sea-ice covered fractions).  Reported as 0. in regions free of sea ice.
column10: time: mean area: mean where sea_ice over sea

column2: Surface Snowfall Rate into the Sea Ice Portion of the Grid Cell
column4: where sea ice over sea: this is computed as the the water mass per unit time falling as snow onto the sea ice portion of a grid cell divided by the area of the ocean portion of the grid cell (including both ice-free and sea-ice covered fractions).  Reported as 0. in regions free of sea ice.
column10: time: mean area: mean where sea_ice over sea

column2: Age of Sea Ice
column4: When computing the time-mean here, the time samples, weighted by the mass of sea ice in the grid cell, are accumulated and then divided by the sum of the weights.  Reported as "missing" in regions free of sea ice.
column10: time: mean (weighted b mass of sea ice)

column2: Frazil Sea Ice Growth (Leads) Rate
column4: the rate of change of sea ice mass due to frazil sea ice formation divided by the area of the ocean portion of the grid cell.  Reported as 0.0 in regions free of sea ice.
column10: time: mean area: mean where sea

column2: Congelation Sea Ice Growth Rate
column4: the rate of change of sea ice mass due to congelation sea ice divided by the area of the ocean portion of the grid cell.  Reported as 0.0 in regions free of sea ice.
column10: time: mean area: mean where sea

column2: Lateral Sea Ice Growth Rate
column4: the rate of change of sea ice mass due to lateral growth alone of the sea ice divided by the area of the ocean portion of the grid cell.  Reported as 0.0 in regions free of sea ice.
column10: time: mean area: mean where sea

column2: Snow-Ice Formation Rate
column4: the rate of change of sea ice mass due to transformation of snow to sea ice, divided by the area of the ocean portion of the grid cell.  Reported as 0.0 in regions free of snow-covered sea ice.
column10: time: mean area: mean where sea

column2: Snow Melt Rate
column4: the rate of change of snow mass  due to melting, divided by the area of the ocean portion of the grid cell.  Reported as 0.0 in regions free of sea ice.  Includes falling snow that melts on impact with the surface.
column10: time: mean area: mean where sea

column2: Rate of Melt at Upper Surface of Sea Ice
column4: the rate of change of sea ice mass due to melting at its upper surface, divided by the area of the ocean portion of the grid cell.  Reported as 0.0 in regions free of sea ice. Does not include rate of change of snow mass.
column10: time: mean area: mean where sea

column2: Rate of Melt at Sea Ice Base
column4: the rate of change of sea ice mass due to melting at its lower surface, divided by the area of the ocean portion of the grid cell.  Reported as 0.0 in regions free of sea ice.
column10: time: mean area: mean where sea

column2: Sea Ice Heat Content
column4: Ice at 0 Celsius is assumed taken to have a heat content of 0 J.  When averaging over time, this quantity is weighted by the mass of sea ice.   Reported as "missing in regions free of sea ice.  Does not include heat content of snow.
column10: time: mean (weighted by mass of sea ice)

column2: Downwelling Shortwave over Sea Ice
column4: the downwelling shortwave flux in regions of sea ice divided by the area of the ocean portion of the grid cell.
column5: priority was raised from 2 to 1 because snow albedo was deleted.
column10: time: mean area: mean where sea_ice over sea

column2: Upward Shortwave over Sea Ice
column4: the upward shortwave flux in regions of sea ice divided by the area of the ocean portion of the grid cell.
column5: priority was raised from 2 to 1 because snow albedo was deleted.
column10: time: mean area: mean where sea_ice over sea

column2: Downwelling Long Wave over Sea Ice
column4: the downwelling longwave flux in regions of sea ice divided by the area of the ocean portion of the grid cell.
column10: time: mean area: mean where sea_ice over sea

column2: Upward Long Wave over Sea Ice
column4: the upward longwave flux in regions of sea ice divided by the area of the ocean portion of the grid cell.
column10: time: mean area: mean where sea_ice over sea

column2: Surface Upward Sensible Heat Flux over Sea Ice
column4: the upward sensible heat flux in regions of sea ice divided by the area of the ocean portion of the grid cell.
column10: time: mean area: mean where sea_ice over sea

column2: Surface Upward Latent Heat Flux over Sea Ice
column4: the upward latent heat flux in regions of sea ice divided by the area of the ocean portion of the grid cell.
column10: time: mean area: mean where sea_ice over sea

column2: Sublimation over Sea Ice
column4: the upward flux of water vapor to the atmosphere due to sublimation of snow and sea  ice in regions of sea ice divided by the area of the ocean portion of the grid cell.
column10: time: mean area: mean where sea_ice over sea

column2: X-Component of Sea Ice Mass Transport
column4: The sea ice mass transport is 0.0 in ice-free regions of the ocean.  Snow is included in calculation of mass.
column10: time: mean

column2: Y-Component of Sea Ice Mass Transport
column4: The sea ice mass transport is 0.0 in ice-free regions of the ocean.  Snow is included in calculation of mass.
column10: time: mean

column2: Sea Ice Mass Transport Through Fram Strait
column10: time: mean

column2: X-Component of Atmospheric Stress On Sea Ice
column4: When computing the time-mean here, the time samples, weighted by the area of sea ice, are accumulated and then divided by the sum of the weights.   Reported as "missing" in regions free of sea ice.
column10: time: mean (weighted by area of sea ice)

column2: Y-Component of Atmospheric Stress On Sea Ice
column4: When computing the time-mean here, the time samples, weighted by the area of sea ice, are accumulated and then divided by the sum of the weights.   Reported as "missing" in regions free of sea ice.
column10: time: mean (weighted by area of sea ice)

column2: X-Component of Ocean Stress On Sea Ice
column4: When computing the time-mean here, the time samples, weighted by the area of sea ice, are accumulated and then divided by the sum of the weights.   Report as "missing" in regions free of sea ice.
column10: time: mean (weighted by area of sea ice)

column2: Y-Component of Ocean Stress On Sea Ice
column4: When computing the time-mean here, the time samples, weighted by the area of sea ice, are accumulated and then divided by the sum of the weights.   Reported as "missing" in regions free of sea ice.
column10: time: mean (weighted by area of sea ice)

column2: Compressive Sea Ice Strength
column4: When computing the time-mean here, the time samples, weighted by the area of sea ice, are accumulated and then divided by the sum of the weights.   Reported as "missing" in regions free of sea ice.
column10: time: mean (weighted by area of sea ice)

column2: Strain Rate Divergence of Sea Ice
column4: When computing the time-mean here, the time samples, weighted by the area of sea ice, are accumulated and then divided by the sum of the weights.   Reported as "missing" in regions free of sea ice.
column10: time: mean (weighted by area of sea ice)

column2: Eastward Derivative of Northward Sea Ice Velocity
column4: When computing the time-mean here, the time samples, weighted by the area of sea ice, are accumulated and then divided by the sum of the weights.   Reported as "missing" in regions free of sea ice.
column10: time: mean (weighted by area of sea ice)

column2: Northward Derivative of Eastward Sea Ice Velocity
column4: When computing the time-mean here, the time samples, weighted by the area of sea ice, are accumulated and then divided by the sum of the weights.   Reported as "missing" in regions free of sea ice.
column10: time: mean (weighted by area of sea ice)

column2: Sea Ice Ridging Rate
column4: When computing the time-mean here, the time samples, weighted by the area of sea ice, are accumulated and then divided by the sum of the weights.   Reported as "missing" in regions free of sea ice.
column10: time: mean (weighted by area of sea ice)
